body_html:
I think what you are suggesting is the following, just to get the ask 100% correct.

  • Upgrade both Python 2 and 3 Dockers to Ubuntu 18.04 (which then means CUDA 9.2)
  • For the Python 2.x Docker we would include command to swap in Python 2.x as the default.

I know this does not help you now, but I am inclined to push for 18.04 for the CUDA 10 release. Thoughts? dirty looks? Maybe donate a pile of GPUs and we do a second CUDA build. :-) Send Gunan and others gifts (under the value that would make the gifts of legal concern).
